text: @BarackObama @MichelleObama Barack Obama criticized President Donald Trump's response to the coronavirus pandemic, calling it "an absolute chaotic disaster," according to an audio recording} you have your nerve to CRITCIZE  trump 2020 wake up and stop telling lies
